content.question: In Paragraph 3, the "pattern" refers to the

choices.label: disapproval voiced toward individuals who failed to correspond regularly
responsibility women had for maintaining family connections
expectation for men to travel and for women to stay at home
tendency for family members to move increasingly farther apart

content.answer: responsibility women had for maintaining family connections

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how the organization of a text creates unity and coherence and reflects a line of reasoning.
